error.connection_problem: Could not retrieve FMI data (invalid FMISID?)

abort.already_configured: A configuration with this label already exists

query.title: FMI integration
query.description:
The easiest way to find observation stations that measure the data you are interested in is to use FMI's observation download service: https://en.ilmatieteenlaitos.fi/download-observations. Identifiers of your selected station can most easiest be found here: {url}. For STUK-queries FMISID doesn't work, use for example places-identifier instead.

**Query settings**

params.title: FMI integration
params.description:
Check the query results ({url}) for parameters that can be used with this query. Parameter names can be found from inside "BsWfs:ParameterName"-elements. Parameter descriptions are available here: {param_url}.

**Parameter settings**

data.label: Name for the sensor created by this integration
data.forecast_step: Time step between two forecast values in minutes
Time step between two forecast values in minutes
